DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long- term safety F2695-SR treatment adult major depressive disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study F2695 SR Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Completed 1 leadin study LVMMD01 , LVMMD02 , LVMMD03 Have normal examination finding final visit leadin study Have negative serum pregnancy test final visit leadin study woman childbearing potential Any exclusionary psychiatric medical condition develop lead study Patients consider suicide risk Women pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become study OR sexually active currently use medically acceptable method contraception
